name: Lead Skeleton
immunities: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren’t adamantine
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: the languages it knew in life but can’t speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The skeleton is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The skeleton has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The skeleton’s weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lead skeleton makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
